Detailed Description

Board state.

Provides the board. It may be filled with pieces. Piece pointer may be obtained via functions pawn(), king(), queen(), rook(), bishop(), knight(). Then piece may be added to the board using add().

To check the piece at specific location use at(). To remove piece from specific location use remove(). To clear the board (remove all pieces) use clear().

Never delete piece pointers. Class manages them internally.
